transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Bola na.
Customer: Nahi hai, to kripya inke sath baat kariye.
Executive: Ha, tezz bolta hai, bola kya bolta hai?
Executive: Kash Bhosle se baat karne ke liye actually mai aap account manager hai IndiaMART se mai baat kar raha tha, Suraj Maurya.
Customer: Abhi idhar to nahi hai idhar, lekin aapka kaam kya hai idhar?
Executive: Ha, account aap handle karti hai mam IndiaMART ka?
Customer: Kya kya?
Executive: IndiaMART ke account aap handle karti hai?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To mam aapka call connect nahi ho raha hai, aapko Dipanshi phone kar rahi hai baar baar, reason behind ki kya issue aa raha hai mam bataiye jara sa.
Customer: Sir, abhi abhi office chalu hua hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Thik hai, so mam aapko mai kis time connect karunga aap bataiye.
Customer: Aap na mere ko 1 baje call karo.
Executive: 1 baje same number pe phone lagata hu mam, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai, koi baat nahi. Okay mam, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive's call was not connecting.



Resolution:

- Executive scheduled a call at 1 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer at 1 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call connection, account management, follow up
